title: BRICS Expansion Will Speed Up De-Dollarization, Chinese Expert Says
description: As more countries join the BRICS economic bloc, there will be a significant increase in settlements using national currencies, leading to an acceleration in the de-dollarization process, a Chinese expert says. “For most developing countries, development is a top priority. That is why the BRICS cooperation mechanism is attractive to these countries,” he added. BRICS […]
